WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
  I am writing grammar based on mini-python example and got following failing test case. It fails both on mini-python and SampleExpressioEvaluator v1.0
  
  Try to run 
   4 - 9/3 * 3
   in Grammar explorer for SampleExpressioEvaluator 
   result 3 but expected is -5

Comments.Message: Yes, this operator precedence bug is supposed to have been fixed but I also think that it is still failing as you describe. Maybe there is a problem with the code in the repository not matching what Roman has on his machine?
My bad, just checked on last version Irony_2012_01_22.zip and it works as expected
